function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Encouraging physical activities for children using basic household items may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not followed","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases and potential illness among children and their families","Mitigation":"Establishing guidelines for hygiene and sanitation, providing training on safe practices, and promoting awareness about disease transmission","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring systems and sanitation technology","People":"Children, parents, and fitness trainers","Owner":"Fitness trainers and SMEs"},{"Description":"Idle employees in the real estate business during the pandemic may lead to increased risk of viral transmission if proper safety measures are not followed","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission among employees and potential spread to clients and customers","Mitigation":"Implementing safety protocols, providing protective gear, and adjusting work processes to minimize close contact","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and remote work technology","People":"Employees, clients, and customers in the real estate business","Owner":"Real estate SMEs and franchisers"},{"Description":"Lack of synchronization in service processes between partners may lead to miscommunication and an increased risk of inefficiency, potentially impacting the delivery of services and public health","Impact":"Inefficient service delivery and potential impact on public health due to miscommunication and lack of coordination","Mitigation":"Establishing clear communication channels, standardizing processes, and implementing collaborative technology platforms","Technologies":"Collaborative software, communication tools, and project management systems","People":"Service partners and stakeholders","Owner":"Service firms and partners"}]}
